å› ä¸º \angle ACE=\angle ABDï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \angle DCE=\angle DIA+\angle DBAï¼Œè¿›è€Œ \angle DCE=\frac{\pi}{2}-\angle DCB-\angle DBC=\frac{\pi}{2}-(\pi - \theta)=-\frac{\pi}{2}+\thetaã€‚
DE^{2}=1 + (\frac{b}{a})^{2}=2^{2}+(3\frac{b}{a})^{2}-2\times2\times3\frac{b}{a}\cos\angle DCEã€‚
ç”±æ­¤æ¨å¯¼å¾—å‡º \sin\theta=\frac{3 + 8(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}{12\frac{b}{a}}ï¼Œä»¤ \frac{b}{a}=tï¼Œåˆ™ \sin\theta=\frac{3 + 8t^{2}}{12t}ï¼Œ\cos\theta=-\sqrt{1 - (\frac{3 + 8t^{2}}{12t})^{2}} ï¼Œç»è¿‡ä¸€ç³»åˆ—åŒ–ç®€å¾—åˆ° \cos\theta=-\frac{1}{12}\sqrt{-(8t+\frac{3}{8t})^{2}+48 + 96}ã€‚
æ‰€ä»¥ BC^{2}=13+\sqrt{48-(8t+\frac{3}{8t})^{2}+96}ã€‚
å½“ 8t+\frac{3}{8t} æœ€å°æ—¶ï¼Œt = \frac{\sqrt{6}}{4} ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ BC^{2}=13+\sqrt{48 + 96-96}=13 + 4\sqrt{3}ã€‚
æ‰€ä»¥ BC_{(max)}=\sqrt{13 + 4\sqrt{3}}=2\sqrt{3}+1 ã€‚
